title: Coffee machines : typical lifetime , by product type
summary: This chart shows the Life of expectancy years at the Coffee from Fully_Automatic_Espresso_Coffee_Machine to Drip_Filter_Coffee_Machine .
\\n From the chart we see that the Life of expectancy years were 10 , at their highest in Fully_Automatic_Espresso_Coffee_Machine .
\\n The expectancy years slowly declined over the next 3 - 4 Coffee to 6 in Drip_Filter_Coffee_Machine .
gold: The statistic illustrates the typical lifetime of coffee machines in the United States , by product type The life expectancy of fully automatic espresso coffee machines is approximately 10 years .
